title: Lentil and Rice Soup in a Jar
ingredients: ['90g pearl barley', '100g dried split peas', '100g white rice', '100g dry lentils', '2 tablespoons dried onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons dried parsley', '2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon lemon pepper', '2 tablespoons beef stock granules', '75g uncooked alphabet pasta shapes or any other small pasta shapes', '55g uncooked macaroni']
